alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 1:59AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Wilkin and east central Richland Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 159 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Galchutt, or 9 miles northwest of Wahpeton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dwight around 200 AM CDT. Abercrombie around 205 AM CDT. McCauleyville around 210 AM CDT. Kent around 215 AM CDT. Brushvale and Wahpeton around 220 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 27 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
